duties_responsibilities.duty: Prospect into large Fortune 1000 companies while running an efficient sales process.
Maintain, build, and own specific relationship maps for your territory, including existing relationships and aspirational contacts.
Develop a deep comprehension of customer's business and negotiate favorable pricing and business terms with large commercial enterprises.
Handle existing customer expectations while expanding reach and depth into assigned territory and demonstrate resourcefulness when faced with challenges.
Have an intuitive sense of necessary steps to close business, gain customer validation and ensure high forecasting accuracy and consistency.

education_certification.credential: 5+ years closing experience in field selling within mid-market and enterprise
